description: Firefox Proxy internal API for accessing Firefox stuff.

events.name: onChanged
events.description: Fired when the proxy setting is changed.

events.name: onConnectivityChanged
events.description: Fired when the system becomes online/offline.

functions.name: hasProxyInUse
functions.description: Return true if an existing proxy configuration has been detected

functions.name: hasConnectivity
functions.description: Return true if we are online
